Summary of the Admission Requirement

Application Portal:                                          Online portal

Application Fee (non-refundable):                    84 CAD

Mode of Payment:                                          Visa/Master card

Academic Calendar:                                       Semester-based

Intake Seasons:                                             Fall/Winter/Summer

Work Experience:                                           Required for Business Programs

Financial Aid:                                                 Scholarships

This is to inform all interested students and the entire public that the Dalhousie University admission for 2024 academic sessions is open online for Undergraduate Programs. The Dalhousie entrance is open for the Fall and Winter or Summer sessions.

Dalhousie Admission Requirement 2024

  1. Completion of secondary school (Grade 12)
  2. A minimum overall average of 70% in five academic Grade 12 courses
  3. A final grade of at least 70% in Grade 12 academic English and any other required subject (see list below)

How to Apply for Admission to Dalhousie University

To apply for admission into Dalhousie University,

  • Go to https://monportail.uDalhousie.ca/admission
  • Click on Accéder à monPortail
  • Or Download from https://www.uDalhousie.ca/sites/default/files/admission/REG-100a-AD.pdf
  • Fill same and send it to the Admission Application Email: reg@reg.uDalhousie.ca

Dalhousie University Application Deadline 2024

Dalhousie University’s application deadline for 2024 for Undergraduate/Graduate Admissions is given as follows. All applications should keep dates.

January 2024 entry

September 15, 2024, international student


September 2024 entry

Mar. 1, 2024 For opening scholarship consideration
Apr. 1, 2024 worldwide applicants
Apr. 15, 2024 Entrance scholarship offers sent out
May 15, 2024 time limit to admit your offer of admission by paying your admission deposit
Scholarship offer acceptance deadline
Deadline to provide proof of English language proficiency
June 2024 First-year course registration opens
June 15, 2024 definite residence application time limit
Aug. 15, 2024 Dalhousie students returning to the same program or visiting students

 

Dalhousie University Application Fees

The admission application form fee differs depending on your desired course /

How to pay for Admission Application form to Dalhousie University

Paying for the entrance application form is done online with the help of a Visa/Master card

Visa Process for International Students

The subsequent credentials are required from all globally admitted students.

  • A valid passport
  • A Québec Acceptance Certificate (CAQ), from the Ministry of immigration for programs longer than 6 months
  • Apply for a study permit and visa
  • Quebec’s immigration law requires proof of valid health and hospitalization insurance.

Dalhousie University Admission Deadlines

Dalhousie University follows a specific timeline for both undergraduate and graduate admissions. The application deadlines vary for domestic and international applicants. The admission deadlines for international applicants are given below:

Dalhousie University Undergraduate Admissions

Dalhousie University offers various undergraduate courses to prospective applicants. The essential admission procedure for all the courses is the same.

Once an application is assessed, the candidate is informed of whether they are admitted to take a ‘qualifying course’, through which students obtain language or information tools essential to excel in the university.
